main-intro.name: Satania
main-intro.language-warning: (These communities use English as their primary language)
main-intro.mobile-disclaimer: I am really sorry, but the mobile version of this website was kinda rushed and it's really shit, I didn't think anyone would visit it on a phone tbh.
main-intro.language-protip:
Would you like to view this website in English?
Use this drop-down to select a language!
main-intro.credits: A glorious shitpost by some pizza named Pizzacus

intro.bold-text: Wanna listen to a devilish song while browsing this page?
intro.small-text: Press the play button on the left!

music-player.footer: You can also listen on YouTube and SoundCloud.

become-a-satania-follower.sub-text: There are no steps to becoming a Satania follower, all you have to do is to accept that Satania is the best character
become-a-satania-follower.small-text: Well, If you could make Satania memes and shitposts, that would help us a lot…

she-is-beautiful.large-text:
A lovely smile.
Two magnificent eyes.
A stunning appearance.
she-is-beautiful.small-text: We Satania followers are very cultured people, so we only use a very cultured language

end-the-waifu-war.sub-text: Let's end the waifu war with the most kawaii demon in the world!

definition-1.definition: the state or quality of being perfect.
definition-1.synonyms-list:
Satania, flawlessness, excellence, superbness, sublimity, exquisiteness, magnificence, perfectness, faultlessness, impeccability, immaculateness, exemplariness
"the satiny perfection of her skin"

definition-2.definition: a person or thing considered to be perfect.
definition-2.example: "I am told that Satania is perfection itself"
definition-2.synonyms-list:
Satania, the ideal, a paragon, the ne plus ultra, the beau idéal, a nonpareil, the crème de la crème, the last word, the ultimate, a dream; informal one in a million, the tops, the best/greatest thing since sliced melon bread, the bee's knees; archaic a nonesuch
"for her, he was still perfection"

definition-3.definition: the action or process of improving something until it is faultless.
definition-3.example: "I worked all day on the perfection of my Satania drawing"
definition-3.synonyms-list:
Satania, improvement, betterment, refinement, refining, perfecting, polishing, amelioration; rare melioration
"the perfection of new mechanisms of economic management"

no-one-can-compete.sub-text: Just think about it, why would Gabriel, Raphi or Vignette be the best?

tries-her-best.category: Tries her best not to fail heaven/hell school

table.member-favorites: Number of member favourites on MAL*
table.subreddit-subs: Number of subs on their subreddit*

the-others-are-trash.large-text: The other characters are trash, no exception.
the-others-are-trash.sub-text: They may be cute, but when you know the facts, they really aren't.

gabriel.name: Gabriel
gabriel.name-detail:
Tenma White
天真=ガヴリール=ホワイト

description.argument-2: No seriously, she has no redeeming qualities
description.argument-3: People only like her because she may be relatable for them
description.argument-4: And being able to relate to Gab is a horrible thing
description.argument-5: She's used for a ton of shitty fanservice, like panty-shots and other questionable camera angles

raphiel.name: Raphiel
raphiel.name-detail:
Shiraha Ainsworth
白羽=ラフィエル=エインズワース

description.argument-1: Is a sadist that only wants others to suffer
description.argument-2: Isn't likable in any way either
description.argument-3: Unless you're also a sadist, but then you're a bad person
description.argument-4: Probably has a foot-fetishism (she asked Satania to lick her feet for some melon bread)
description.argument-5: Her fans are perverts AND horrible people

vignette.name: Vignette
vignette.name-detail:
Tsukinose April
月乃瀬=ヴィネット=エイプリル

description.argument-2: No really, she never does anything interesting
description.argument-3: Like, she's all normal and stuff
description.argument-4: People only like her because she's cute
description.argument-5: She probably was just made to add more moe material
description.argument-6: Doesn't even TRY to be evil, even tho she's a DEMON

fanarts.sub-text: Just look at this, this is adorable. <noscript>Slideshow requires JavaScript.</noscript>

autism.large-text: Also, she's not an autist, stop saying that
autism.sub-text:
Autistic people often have trouble communicating, staying quiet in their own corner all the time, Satania isn't like that at all.
She's probably less autistic than you are!
autism.small-text:
And while she does say "I'm thwee" in that episode,
it's because Raphiel made her say it!

pope-francis.sub-text:
"Satania is my number two waifu, the number one being Jesus of course!
I bless her and all her followers!"

flipping-cards.large-text: She replaces all the other waifus in the show
flipping-cards.sub-text: When you think about it, Satania is a perfect alternative to every character in Gabriel Dropout…Click on any of these cards to see the answers

gabriel.question: Do you need a girl who isn't very nice, doesn't care about anyone and thinks her hobbies are more important than anything?
gabriel.answer:
Then you need the demon who doesn't care about humans and angels and is always trying to be evil, rather than studying or something…
Also, she doesn't do her homework ON PURPOSE!!

vigne.question: Would you like a cute moe demon that wanna be evil, but is very bad at it, ending up doing nice things like teaching stuff to Gabriel?
vigne.answer: Then you'll probably like the demon who is trying her best to become the greatest one, but is frequently manipulated into doing nice things, even tho she is trying her best to teach Gabriel a good lesson…

raphiel.question: Do you want a girl that looks cute, but is actually really mean and only wants to see everyone suffer?
raphiel.answer: That sounds exactly like Satania! Because becoming the greatest Arch Demon the world has ever known, probably implies hurting or killing a lot of people…

satania.question: How about the greatest demon in the entire universe?

raviolli-raviolli.sub-text: Why would you do that??? How much of a sadist do you have to be to want to bulli her???

large-text.large-text: She's gonna rule over humanity anyway…
large-text.sub-text:
So, may you like her or not,
you'll have to praise her eventually…

_javascriptLocales.copyMessage:
Just wanted to let you know that Satania is always with you! Even inside your clipboard! We are everywhere and you should really join us!
Also yes, any website can access your clipboard however they want, isn't that creepy?
Regardless, Satania is the BEST WAIFU, and you should agree! http://satania.moe/
